video.title: Danger Mouse
video.synopsis: Follow the adventures of superspy Danger Mouse and his bumbling sidekick, Penfold, as they jet around the world foiling their enemies' evil plots.

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse must fend off ever-larger robots of destruction unleashed by his evil archrival Baron Greenback.
episodes.title: Rogue Robots

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse must survive a mechanical Loch Ness Monster attack to stop Baron Greenback from taking over the world with stolen bagpipes.
episodes.title: Who Stole the Bagpipes

episodes.synopsis: Baron Greenback kidnaps Colonel K and forces him to send Danger Mouse and Penfold on vacation to a castle full of robot ghosts and mummies.
episodes.title: Trouble with Ghosts

episodes.synopsis: When Baron Greenback unleashes giant super-chickens on London, Danger Mouse and Penfold enlist the help of Flying Officer Buggles Pigeon.
episodes.title: Chicken Run

episodes.synopsis: With plans of tunneling into the Bank of England, Baron Greenback creates a Martian mouse exterminator to take care of Danger Mouse.
episodes.title: The Martian Misfit

episodes.synopsis: Baron Greenback traps Danger Mouse and Penfold in his Dream Machine, where anything Penfold says comes to life.
episodes.title: The Dream Machine

episodes.synopsis: Penfold thinks he is lord of the jungle when he and Danger Mouse travel to Africa to save 20,000 elephants Baron Greenback turned into sugar cubes.
episodes.title: Lord of the Bungle

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse must save the prime minister from Baron Greenback, who is causing the leaders of the world to laugh themselves to death.
episodes.title: Die Laughing

episodes.synopsis: Baron Greenback uses his newly perfected intergalactic traveling device to blast Danger Mouse and Penfold to a planet ruled by talking machines.
episodes.title: The World of Machines

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse travels to the North Pole, where Baron Greenback is using an antigravity machine to prevent Earth from rotating.
episodes.title: Ice Station Camel

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse and Penfold must stop Baron Greenback's latest diabolical plot to sink England with a plague of heavy pyramids.
episodes.title: A Plague of Pyramids

episodes.synopsis: When Baron Greenback's latest evil deed leaves the world drowning in custard, Danger Mouse must track down the Custard Mite of Glut.
episodes.title: Custard

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse and Penfold head to an island near the Bermuda Triangle to stop Baron Greenback, but they're abducted by aliens and subjected to a probe.
episodes.title: Close Encounters of the Absurd Kind

episodes.synopsis: Baron Greenback challenges Danger Mouse to a high-stakes duel, with the loser promising to bow out of the world of crime for good.
episodes.title: The Duel

episodes.synopsis: Baron Greenback has gained control of London's washing machines and is ordering them to destroy Danger Mouse, who fights back using a giant magnet.
episodes.title: The Day of the Suds

episodes.synopsis: When Baron Greenback creates a bad luck ray from a laser and a stolen jewel, Danger Mouse and Penfold must return the gem to its rightful owner.
episodes.title: The Bad Luck Eye of the Little Yellow God

episodes.synopsis: Baron Greenback kidnaps Penfold and demands that Danger Mouse round up four ingredients for a spell that would summon a powerful monster.
episodes.title: The Four Tasks of Danger Mouse

episodes.synopsis: Using a ray to shrink himself, Baron Greenback invades Colonel K's body, with a newly shrunken Danger Mouse and Penfold in pursuit.
episodes.title: The Invasion of Colonel K

episodes.synopsis: Threatening to destroy every signpost in the world, Baron Greenback lures Danger Mouse and Penfold to his secret lair somewhere in the Pacific Ocean.
episodes.title: Danger Mouse Saves the World... Again!

episodes.synopsis: Baron Greenback pulls out all the stops to thwart Danger Mouse as he transports secret plans hidden in a football from Australia to London.
episodes.title: The Odd Ball Runaround

episodes.synopsis: When top secret cargo ships begin disappearing in the vicinity of a mysterious ghost bus, Danger Mouse rushes to the Indian Ocean to investigate.
episodes.title: Strange Case of the Ghost Bus

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse and Penfold head to Texas when they learn that Baron Greenback has devised an ingenious method for stealing the world's great monuments.
episodes.title: Trip to America

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse and Penfold travel the world visiting Baron Greenback's hideouts after coming across his computerized hideout locator.
episodes.title: The Wild, Wild Goose Chase!

episodes.synopsis: Count Duckula pays a visit to London, where he captures Danger Mouse and Penfold while trying to break into showbiz.
episodes.title: The Return of Count Duckula!

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse prepares to face off against a demon from the fourth dimension who's been stealing the world's most famous buildings.
episodes.title: Demons Aren't Dull?!

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse must come to the rescue when Prof. Von Squawkencluck accidentally sends Penfold back to the prehistoric era in his time machine.
episodes.title: 150 Million Years Lost

episodes.synopsis: When the Mark 5 passes through an electrical storm, Danger Mouse and Penfold are transported to a future era where Britain is ruled by cats.
episodes.title: The Planet of the Cats

episodes.synopsis: Colonel K's team creates robot versions of Danger Mouse and Penfold so one pair can meet with Agent 57 while the other deals with Baron Greenback.
episodes.title: Four Heads Are Better Than Two

episodes.synopsis: After visiting the Rock of Gibraltar, Danger Mouse and Penfold track Baron Greenback to a skyscraper in New York City.
episodes.title: Tower of Terror

episodes.synopsis: Baron Greenback joins forces with Count Duckula to search for the Great Bone Idol, which would enable them to control all the dogs in the world.
episodes.title: The Great Bone Idol

episodes.synopsis: When Danger Mouse loses his memory, Baron Greenback tricks the secret agent into believing he's actually a criminal mastermind.
episodes.title: Public Enemy No. 1

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse and Penfold head deep into the jungle to find the lost crown of an Aztec ruler -- but Baron Greenback has a trick or two up his sleeve.
episodes.title: Long Lost Crown Affair

episodes.synopsis: Sent with Danger Mouse to battle a small but ferocious dragon, Penfold gets himself captured by the beast and imprisoned in his castle.
episodes.title: By George, It's a Dragon!

episodes.synopsis: Baron Greenback's dastardly new invention, a cloning machine, confounds Danger Mouse by creating hundreds of duplicate Penfolds.
episodes.title: Tiptoe Through the Penfolds

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse and Penfold blast off for the moon to sabotage a communications-jamming base Baron Greenback has constructed there.
episodes.title: Project Moon

episodes.synopsis: Using his new weather-controlling machine, Baron Greenback pelts Danger Mouse and Penfold with hail and plans to unleash a new ice age upon the earth.
episodes.title: The Next Ice Age Begins at Midnight

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse and Penfold get a frightful awakening when Colonel K chooses them as ambassadors to greet aliens who are about to land in Scotland.
episodes.title: The Aliens Are Coming

episodes.synopsis: While henchman Stiletto creates a diversion, Baron Greenback uses a new device to remotely take control of Danger Mouse and Penfold's flying car.
episodes.title: Remote-Controlled Chaos

episodes.synopsis: A peddler of gadgets tries to interest Danger Mouse and Penfold in devices to help them infiltrate Baron Greenback's new secluded lair.
episodes.title: The Man from Gadget

episodes.synopsis: Blasted by Baron Greenback's age-altering bombs, Danger Mouse turns into a boy rodent and Penfold transforms into a geriatric hamster.
episodes.title: Tampering with Time Tickles

episodes.synopsis: Nero uses the extraordinary mental powers he accidentally gained from one of Baron Greenback's inventions to torment Danger Mouse and Penfold.
episodes.title: Nero Power

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse and Penfold inadvertently get sent back in time to the year 1215, where they get caught up in a strange Robin Hood scenario.
episodes.title: Once Upon a Time Slip

episodes.synopsis: All of the most important seats in England are stuffed with cactus needles, so Danger Mouse and Penfold head to Mexico to track down Greenback.
episodes.title: Viva Danger Mouse

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse and Penfold have to rely on a cassette player when the world's worst composer decides to destroy all music other than his.
episodes.title: Play It Again, Wufgang

episodes.synopsis: Greenback uses a device to brainwash Colonel K into sending DM and Penfold to the South Pole, but Penfold's bad hearing makes him immune to it.
episodes.title: Hear, Hear

episodes.synopsis: A spaceship crash-lands in Birmingham, and the alien inside is looking for his pet, a furry creature that multiplies every time something touches it.
episodes.title: Multiplication Fable

episodes.synopsis: Penfold has a cold, so Agent 57 joins Danger Mouse in a plot to defeat Greenback. But 57 gets a cold too, and changes form every time he sneezes.
episodes.title: The Spy Who Stayed in with a Cold

episodes.synopsis: An experimental enzyme being developed by the Wonder White Sub company gets loose and starts attacking people and turning everything white.
episodes.title: It's All White, White Wonder

episodes.synopsis: While Danger Mouse and Penfold are investigating a robbery of the crown jewels, they end up in a grandfather clock that's actually a time machine.
episodes.title: The Hickory Dickory Dock Dilemma

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse's flying car, the Mark III, begins to rebel against him and it's keeping him and Penfold from attending an awards ceremony.
episodes.title: What a Three-Point Turn-Up for the Book

episodes.synopsis: An alien named J.J. Quark arrives and attempts to take control of Earth, believing that he's entitled to it because of an old charter.
episodes.title: Quark! Quark!

episodes.synopsis: Greenback hopes to cash in by melting the polar ice caps so he can sell inflatable rafts and toys at a ridiculously high price.
episodes.title: Alping Is Snow Easy Matter

episodes.synopsis: While Greenback is away on vacation in France, Stiletto uses a ray to make spiders get bigger and build webs that envelop all of London.
episodes.title: AAAGHHG!! Spiders!

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse must work with an organization called BLEEP to locate an estate that's been stolen by a villainous warthog named Hannibal.
episodes.title: One of Our Stately Homes Is Missing

episodes.synopsis: J.J. Quark proposes peace talks with Danger Mouse in Africa but sends a beast called a Fangboner after Danger Mouse and Penfold when they arrive.
episodes.title: Afternoon Off with the Fangboner

episodes.synopsis: The villainous El Loco poisons Danger Mouse's milk, forcing Penfold into action to stop El Loco.
episodes.title: Beware of Mexicans Delivering Milk

episodes.synopsis: When a mechanical cat kidnaps Colonel K, Danger Mouse and Penfold try to save him. But the cat seems to be able to stay one step ahead of them.
episodes.title: CATastrophe

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse and Penfold travel to Stonehenge to investigate a disturbance, and Danger Mouse ends up having to battle his own evil side.
episodes.title: The Good, the Bad and the Motionless

episodes.synopsis: Greenback causes trouble in London by using a ray to animate all of the city's statues, resulting in chaos and mayhem.
episodes.title: Statues

episodes.synopsis: The grandfather clock time machine returns with a wizard named Master Snozzle on board, and he's looking to take over the world.
episodes.title: The Clock Strikes Back

episodes.synopsis: Greenback has sent Great Britain into a panic by stealing all of the world's tea and replacing it with dirty dishwater.
episodes.title: Ee-Tea!

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse and Penfold inadvertently bring back a bandit named El Loco when they return from a trip to Mexico.
episodes.title: Bandits Beans and Ballyhoo

episodes.synopsis: J.J. Quark gives Penfold a membership to an intergalactic book club, then brings the monsters in one book to life to torment him and Danger Mouse.
episodes.title: Have You Fled from Any Good Books Lately?

episodes.synopsis: Greenback wants to acquire an ancient Egyptian amulet, but instead of looking for it, he plans to steal it once Danger Mouse finds it.
episodes.title: Tut, Tut, It's Not Pharaoh

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse and Penfold get caught up with a witch doctor when they go on a mission to an island near China to rescue Professor Squawkencluck.
episodes.title: Lost, Found and Spellbound

episodes.synopsis: Penfold takes a pill invented by Professor Squawkencluck and turns into a superhero, causing issues for Danger Mouse as he searches for a pigeon.
episodes.title: Penfold, B.F.

episodes.synopsis: All of the world's machines turn against their owners and refuse to do their jobs, so Danger Mouse has to take action with his anti-mutiny module.
episodes.title: Mechanised Mayhem

episodes.synopsis: Tasked with finding the source of an awful noise that's bothering the world, Danger Mouse and Penfold end up at the North Pole.
episodes.title: Journey to the Earth's 'Cor!

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse and Penfold board the famous Orient Express when they learn of Baron Greenback's plans for a museum dedicated to Barry Manilow.
episodes.title: DM on the Orient Express

episodes.synopsis: When an alien invasion looms, Baron Greenback offers to team up with Danger Mouse and Penfold, but his truce could actually be a trap.
episodes.title: The Ultra Secret Secret

episodes.synopsis: When Dr. Frankenstoat invents a dastardly device that churns out robot vampoids, Danger Mouse and Penfold storm his castle.
episodes.title: Duckula Meets Frankenstoat

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse and Penfold search for Merlin's wish-granting inkwell, but they've got competition from the villainous Copper-Conk Cassidy.
episodes.title: When There's a Well, There's a Way

episodes.synopsis: Scottish snake Mac the Fork and wannabe scientist Dudley Poyson join forces to steal blueprints for a deadly weapon that could destroy Earth.
episodes.title: All Fall Down

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse and Penfold blast off into space to investigate why the moon's gravitational pull is causing massive flooding on Earth.
episodes.title: Turn of the Tide

episodes.synopsis: After London is shrouded in darkness for nearly a week, Danger Mouse and Penfold rocket into outer space to investigate the cause.
episodes.title: Gremlin Alert

episodes.synopsis: When Baron Greenback uses his mind control machine and a passport photo to turn Penfold into an assassin, Danger Mouse is first on his hit list.
episodes.title: Cor! What a Picture!

episodes.synopsis: When Baron Greenback schemes to melt the polar ice caps with sun lamps, Danger Mouse and Penfold head to the Arctic to foil his plan.
episodes.title: I Spy with My Little Eye

episodes.synopsis: Learning that a hairy beast is roaming the countryside and flattening villages with his feet, Danger Mouse and Penfold go to Canada to investigate.
episodes.title: Bigfoot Falls

episodes.synopsis: When the Statue of Liberty vanishes, Danger Mouse and Penfold leap into action to find out how Baron Greenback pulled it off.
episodes.title: Statue of Liberty Caper

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Crumhorn replaces Penfold with a mechanical double. Not to be outdone, Baron Greenback forces Stiletto to impersonate Penfold, too.
episodes.title: Penfold Transformed

episodes.synopsis: When their Mark III flying car runs out of fuel, Danger Mouse and Penfold find themselves stranded in the Sahara Desert.
episodes.title: Dune with a View

episodes.synopsis: In Spain, Don Coyote takes "Sancho" Penfold as his sidekick. Together, they attack a windmill that houses Baron Greenback's nefarious new device.
episodes.title: Don Coyote and Sancho Penfold

episodes.synopsis: While Danger Mouse and Penfold are in New York, Doctor Augustus P. Crumhorn III poses as a young girl and claims her father was kidnapped.
episodes.title: Crumhorn Strikes Back!

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse and Penfold are off to the Amazon Jungle where a mysterious tribe have been sacrificing people to an ant god.
episodes.title: Ants, Trees and Whoops-a-Daisy

episodes.synopsis: To investigate why all the European countries have swapped places, Danger Mouse and Penfold head to Bratislowakia and find something even worse.
episodes.title: There's a Penfold in My Suit

episodes.synopsis: While Penfold is writing his memoir of his life with Danger Mouse, Dr. Crumhorn "Kazonks" them into a hallucinatory world.
episodes.title: Rhyme and Punishment

episodes.synopsis: Danger Mouse must stop Baron Greenback's attempt to take over London with his army of remote-controlled, allergy-causing pillows.
episodes.title: Pillow Fright

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Crumhorn has overtaken London with concrete-swimming land sharks, and things get really dicey when Penfold becomes shark bait.
episodes.title: Heavy Duty

episodes.synopsis: A giant spaceship, which is part of the "Intergalactic 147" snooker game, is headed straight for Earth in order to sink it into a black hole.
episodes.title: The Intergalactic 147
